data.title: Vourkoti
data.text:
To support @lerefugeofficiel, HÃ©lÃ¨ne Mastrandreas "VOURKOTI" short film will be free for a week on Pressure Culture. Happy pride month!

I would like to live in a caring world where it is easy to express yourself. So, I take power over myself and I do. Let us support our different expressions of desire, gender with freedom and respect. Letâ€™s be free to be whoever we want.

But to be useful it is necessary to act, so let's support @lerefugeofficiel a wonderful association which hosts and supports young LGBT + who do not have the chance to evolve from a safe space ðŸ’Œ le-refuge.org/don ðŸ’Œ
